comment: The vertex degree of a one-edge graph, case 3: an edge from some other vertex to the given vertex contributes one to the vertex's degree. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 21-Feb-2021.)
